backend/main.mo: Defines types and initial state for residents, profiles, vitals, MAR, ADL, and authorization, setting up maps and access control for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing rollback-related changes, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text mapping frontend file paths to their functional descriptions for documentation or build auditing.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables, light/dark theme tokens, and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML app entry point with meta version 46, title, icons, and script loader.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/version.txt: Version marker file containing the value 46.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, React Query, protected authentication gate, routes, and the app shell.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication wrapper showing login UI until Internet Identity is established and then rendering child content.
Logo component that attempts multiple URL variants for the brand image and falls back to initials if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Main layout wrapper providing header, navigation, content outlet, footer, and sign-out handling with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Renders the Maui navigation bar with a single dashboard link and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Provides a dialog form for creating a new resident with validation and nested data handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Contains a dialog for submitting new ADL records with validation and backend mutation.
Displays a resident’s ADL records, sorted by timestamp, with loading states and delete support.
Re-exports ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Displays an editable dialog for resident information with validation and physician list management.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Form dialog for creating MAR records using active medications and submitting to backend.
Re-exports MAR dialog and history list components.
Shows a resident’s MAR history with delete functionality and formatted date/time.
Dialog for adding a medication with dosage, route, schedule, prescriber, and notes.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Shows a resident summary card with profile navigation, status toggle, and delete confirmation.
Renders the dashboard header with a title and button to add a new resident.
Provides UI controls for filtering residents by room and sorting by key fields.
Displays a grid of resident cards or an empty state when no residents match filters.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged residents.
Renders tabs for filtering residents by status (All, Active, Discharged).
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Form dialog for recording vital signs, converting units, and submitting to backend.
Displays a resident's vitals history with sorting, formatting, oxygen status indicators, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Renders a placeholder card listing missing reference materials and linking to a full checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Defines query key helpers for resident-related React Query caches scoped by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for user profiles, resident seeding, and directory and resident-related backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, light and dark theme CSS variables, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports branding constants including facility name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that loads residents from backend, applies filters/sorting, computes KPIs, and handles resident status updates and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication records for residents, including special cases and default data.
Defines mock resident profile structures and returns fallback profile data when backend info is missing.
Contains a static mock list of residents with basic attributes for testing or fallback display.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Transforms backend resident directory and full resident objects into UI-friendly view models, including age and room formatting.
Utility functions for filtering, sorting, KPI computation, and extracting unique rooms from resident view models.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays a resident’s detailed profile with vitals, MAR, ADL, medications, editing, and printing, using backend data when available and mock data as fallback.
Printable resident profile report component rendering personal info, insurance, medications, and other details.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: A React page listing categorized reference materials needed to replicate the Moritz Care Home UI, using alerts, accordions, and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project’s current state, existing features, and versioning for the Maui Lane Care Home app build.
